::Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike walks through a doorway. "This," he says, looking back at 
Skulletron, "Is the bridge. Most of the time Zardus can be found here, but 
he's out fighting or negotiating alot too."

Bloodystrike walks over to a panel, tapping some buttons. "The interior 
defences can be activated by anyone who is part of the Alliance, and 
deactivated by anyone who has equal or greater rank. Zardus made this ship, 
so he's got total controll, don't try to take it from him."

Bloodystrike looks at Skulletron, noting that the bot's hand is near his gun. 
"The interior defences don't like weapon fire. Detection of any could cause a 
few blast panels to trap you in a hallway, and the autoguns to finish you 
off, so be careful."

Bloodystrike looks around. "That's about it for the bridge. Where do you want 
to go next? Torture chambers, the lab, the brig, weapon storage?"
